text: And the king commanded Chelcias the high priest, and the priests of the second order, and them that kept the door, to bring out of the temple of the Lord all the vessels that were made for Baal, and for the grove, and all the host of heaven, and he burned them without Jerusalem in the 23. 4 The Gr. is from the Heb. word.fields of Kedron, and 23. 4 Gr. cast.took the ashes of them to BÃ¦thel.
